## OAS\_ENHANCER\_EXTENSION\_POINT\_NAME variable

Name/id of the OAS enhancer extension point

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
OAS_ENHANCER_EXTENSION_POINT_NAME = "oas-enhancer"
```
